glosses: causative of öpmek, to let someone kiss or to make someone kiss (used with -e for the person and -i for the part being kissed)

examples.text: Bayramda dedelere yanaklarımı öptürmeyi sevmiyorum çünkü ıslatarak öpüyorlar.
examples.translation: On Eids, I don't like letting old people kiss me on the cheeks because they give a wet kiss.

examples.text: İçeri girdiğinde sana yüzüğünü öptürecek ve öpmezsen başın belaya girecek, bu iş çok ciddi.
examples.translation: After he walks in he is going to make you kiss his ring and if you don't do it you're gonna be in trouble, this is serious.
